author: brane
msg: Fix a test failure on Windows.
* subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/svnlook_tests.py
(test_print_property_diffs): Don't try to use an empty commit message,
that doesn't work very well with Windows shells.

author: striker
msg: Fix for Branko's failing diff tests on HP.
* subversion/libsvn_diff/diff_file.c
(map_or_read_file): Clear out the mm when apr_mmap_create fails.

author: philip
msg: * subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/update_tests.py
(non_recursive_update): New regression test for non-recursive update.

author: dws
msg: * rpm/redhat-7.x/doc.patch,
rpm/redhat-7.x/subversion.spec,
rpm/redhat-8+/doc.patch,
rpm/redhat-8+/subversion.spec : Fix documentation version number to be
generated properly in the RedHat RPMs.  Can't use the normal svnversion
command at this point because the SRPM is not a repository that we can
get the version from via svnversion command.

author: dws
msg: * packages/rpm/redhat-7.x/subversion.spec,
packages/rpm/redhat-8+/subversion.spec : Don't bomb out of RPM update or
just because we can't restart the apache (httpd) server.  This fixes the
bug where the rpm update doesn't un-install the old subversion-server
package because the apache (httpd) server failed to restart.
